title: GSL.2013.WCS.S3.Challenger.Round1.Day1.720p.Starcraft.2
description:
WCS Korea Season 3

Challenger League 


WCS is a Starcraft tournament run by Blizzard

The videos are HD Rip from the GOM TV VODs with english commentary.

The biggest Starcraft 2 tournament in the world is WCS. The players in the grand finals come from the regional tournaments in the Americas, Europe and Korea.

GOM TV and OGN organize the WCS: Korea.

The tournament is divided into the StarLeague (former Code S) and Challenger League (former Code A).


Here you can find a chart with the format of WCS: Korea:

http://i.imgur.com/fyZ4CP6.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://i.imgur.com/fyZ4CP6.jpg</a>
